/**
 * FilterPanel Component
 * 
 * Displays filter buttons for each location type
 * Features:
 * - Toggle visibility of Food Banks, Community Fridges, and Food Boxes
 * - Color-coded to match map markers
 * - Responsive design: compact on mobile, larger on desktop
 * - Active filters show with highlighted background
 */import React from'react';import'./FilterPanel.css';/**
 * Filter configuration with colors matching map markers
 * Each filter includes:
 * - key: Matches location.type in data
 * - label: Display name for users
 * - color: Hex code matching map marker color
 * - icon: Emoji for visual identification
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const filterOptions=[{key:'foodbank',label:'Food Banks',color:'#2e7d32',icon:'üè¶'},{key:'community_fridge',label:'Community Fridges',color:'#66bb6a',icon:'üßä'},{key:'food_box',label:'Food Boxes',color:'#fdd835',icon:'üì¶'}];/**
 * @param {Object} selectedTypes - Object with boolean values for each type
 *   Example: { foodbank: true, community_fridge: false, food_box: true }
 * @param {Function} onFilterChange - Callback to toggle filter on/off
 *   Called with filter key (e.g., 'foodbank')
 */function FilterPanel(_ref){let{selectedTypes,onFilterChange}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Filter Locations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-options",children:filterOptions.map(option=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-option ".concat(selectedTypes[option.key]?'active':''),onClick:()=>onFilterChange(option.key),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"filter-color",style:{backgroundColor:option.color}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"filter-icon",children:option.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"filter-label",children:option.label})]},option.key))})]});}export default FilterPanel;
